page.title: 07Daily Life -A Farmers Wife
page.content: Our interviewee is the wife of a farmer who owns several hundreds of acres of land at Croxall.She lives in a very large farmhouse and has three children. After getting up at about 7 o'clock she prepares a breakfast of bacon cooked in a microwave oven and toast made in a toaster.She then washes up and her husband starts work at about 8 o'clock. About this time the telephone starts ringing with calls about the business. The Farmers Wife takes the messages and orders the feed and just before nine she takes her younger daughter to school. Once a fortnight at 9.30a.m. she weighs the bull calves. Most of the morning she spends doing housework such as dusting hoovering and cleaning.She eats a snack lunch at 12.30 before continuing with the cleaning.
